sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.VaCallbackPropertyUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>VaCallbackPropertyUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var VaCallbackPropertyUtil = Class.create();
VaCallbackPropertyUtil.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    setCallbackEnabled: function(value) {
		var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_properties");
		gr.addQuery("name", 'com.glide.cs.callback.enabled');
		gr.query();
		if (gr.next()) {
			gr.setValue('value', value);
			gr.update();
		}
    },

    isCallbackEnabled: function() {
        return gs.getProperty('com.glide.cs.callback.enabled');
    },

    type: 'VaCallbackPropertyUtil'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-05-09 08:51:23</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>0fa68d6a53130110657addeeff7b12cc</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>VaCallbackPropertyUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Live Agent Conversation Settings" source="com.glide.cs.live_agent_settings">22f66e472f000110d8a4d5f62799b614</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0fa68d6a53130110657addeeff7b12cc</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-05-16 12:40:43</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>510</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
